original_text: He entered the house of God, and taking the consecrated bread, he ate what is lawful only for priests to eat. And he also gave some to his companions.”
korean_text: 그가 하나님의 전에 들어가서 다만 제사장 외에는 먹어서는 안 되는 진설병을 먹고 함께 한 자들에게도 주지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: He entered the house of God
he ate what is lawful only for priests to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 제사장만 먹도록 허락된 것을 먹었고

sentences.original_text: And he also gave some to his companions
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 동료들에게도 약간을 주었다
